A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie was utterly disappointing. A big slap to the face of all fans of Star Wars. The massive amounts of plot holes and useless scenes is unbearable. The casino scene and plot with Finn/Rose is utterly disgraceful. Rose is one of the worst characters ever since Jar Jar. That's saying something. Everything I love about Star Wars was ruined in this movie. It feels like some cheesy\, big budget Sci-Fi movie in some galaxy that is NOT Star Wars. A big shame. The trailer was interesting and I was hoping to leave the movie satisfied. Disney buying the franchise was the worst thing to happen to Star Wars.
